Modul model
Package de.kaiser.model.style

Klasse TextRunStyleProperties

java.lang.Object
de.kaiser.model.style.ElementStyleProperties
de.kaiser.model.style.InlineElementStyleProperties
de.kaiser.model.style.InlineTextElementStyleProperties
de.kaiser.model.style.TextRunStyleProperties
public class TextRunStyleProperties extends InlineTextElementStyleProperties
Concrete style properties for an inline text run element. It primarily references a font-style and can add text-specific decorations.

    • getBaselineShift

    • setBaselineShift

    • createResolved

      public static TextRunStyleProperties createResolved(ElementBlockStyleProperties parentStyle, TextRunStyleProperties specificStyle)
      Factory method to create a new, resolved style by combining a parent style with an optional, more specific style.
      Parameter:
      parentStyle - The style inherited from the parent block (can be null).
      specificStyle - The specific style for this text run (can be null).
      Gibt zurück:
      A new, fully resolved TextRunStyleProperties object.

    • mergeWith

      public void mergeWith(ElementStyleProperties base)

    • copy

      public TextRunStyleProperties copy()
      Beschreibung aus Klasse kopiert: ElementStyleProperties
      Creates a deep copy of this style properties object. This is crucial to prevent style modifications on one element from affecting another.
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      copy in Klasse InlineTextElementStyleProperties
      Gibt zurück:
      A new instance with the same property values as this object.
